H0.text: What is the capital of the U.S. state of Connecticut. New Haven

H1.text: What is the capital of the U.S. state of Connecticut. Bridgeport

H2.text: What is the capital of the U.S. state of Connecticut. Stamford

H3.text: What is the capital of the U.S. state of Connecticut. Hartford

A4.text: Hartford is the capital city of the U.S. state of Connecticut.

A5.text: Hartford alternated with New Haven as dual capitals of Connecticut from 1664, and Hartford has been the sole capital since 1875.
